doc.title: Fatal Addiction
doc.plot: Fatal Addiction: Tobacco's Deadly Grasp is a compelling and emotional look at the results of this deadly and insidious habit. Hear firsthand from a 13-year-old girl how tobacco took something from her that can never be replaced and see how she struggles each day to deal with her loss. You will meet people who are trying to make a difference and prevent young people from falling into this dangerous and deadly habit. And, on the front lines of the battle, see what communities and local governments are doing to stem the tide of teenage tobacco use.
